feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.45.1: Framework Tweaks & Dependency Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

:rocket: Features

  • Framework: Puma, Lograge Updates & Remove rack-timeout (#2426) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.157.0 to 1.158.0 (#2424) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.201.4 to 3.201.5 (#2423) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.963.0 to 1.964.0 (#2422) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.45.1

..and go to http://localhost:5100

:link: Useful Links

  • Documentation
  • Docker Hub
  • GitHub
  • Website
  • Twitter
  • Newsletter

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.45.3: Fix Override Base URL Bug
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

PWP__OVERRIDE_BASE_URL broke recently. Thanks to Rok & @tibo59 for reporting!

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • 7.2 Gemfile Updates (#2435) @pglombardo
  • Fix Override Base URL Construction (#2438) @pglombardo
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.965.0 to 1.966.0 (#2436) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump minitest from 5.25.0 to 5.25.1 (#2434) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump parallel from 1.26.2 to 1.26.3 (#2433) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-storage_v1 from 0.42.0 to 0.43.0 (#2432) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-ast from 1.32.0 to 1.32.1 (#2430) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.964.0 to 1.965.0 (#2431) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump stimulus-rails from 1.3.3 to 1.3.4 (#2429) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.45.3

..and go to http://localhost:5100

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.45.4: Fix Custom Locale on Pushes
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Pass locale through preliminary step (#2444) Thanks @mathsyx69 for reporting!

:rocket: Features

  • Latest Language Strings (#2439) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump actionmailbox from 7.2.0 to 7.2.1 (#2458) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump activemodel from 7.2.0 to 7.2.1 (#2459) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump brakeman from 6.1.2 to 6.2.1 (#2456) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump actiontext from 7.2.0 to 7.2.1 (#2457) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rails from 7.2.0 to 7.2.1 (#2455) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump activesupport from 7.2.0 to 7.2.1 (#2454) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump activestorage from 7.2.0 to 7.2.1 (#2453) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump activerecord from 7.2.0 to 7.2.1 (#2451) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump actionview from 7.2.0 to 7.2.1 (#2452) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.967.0 to 1.968.0 (#2450) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump activejob from 7.2.0 to 7.2.1 (#2445) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rexml from 3.3.5 to 3.3.6 (#2442) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.966.0 to 1.967.0 (#2441) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.158.0 to 1.159.0 (#2440) @dependabot

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.45.5: Add Sentry for APM
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

:rocket: Features
